customCardSection.title: IdealTechno
customCardSection.subtitle: We provide comprehensive solutions for all your industrial automation needs, including:
customCardSection.subtitle2: IdealTechno is an industrial integrator with over 20 years of experience. We implement industrial robots and automated installations. We develop machine vision systems based on artificial intelligence.

section2Vision.point1: To be a leader in implementing turnkey industrial projects
section2Vision.point2: To strive for high-quality and modern project completion
section2Vision.point3: To be the best. Like the solutions we develop and maintain, this vision is built on a solid foundation.
section2Vision.point5: To strive for operational excellence, with a focus on quality and profitability
